TopicTitle: Metal "Girders" for Connecting Pieces from a Distance?

Articles.Content:
I\'m looking into building a space station in a large ring shape, and I don\'t want to have to connect all the components directly. Is there a part somewhere that would allow me to do this? I\'m pretty sure I saw something like this a long time ago, but I can\'t find it and it\'s hard to search for!

Any help would be awesome!

Hi djewell11, welcome to the KSP community.

Though I have not experimented much with space stations, I heard the [Kosmos pack was good for space station parts](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7178.0), also you might want to look at the [Truss pack](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9026.0) as well.

But like I said I haven\'t a lot of experience with this stuff so they may not be what you are looking for, but if they are then I\'m looking forwards to seeing what you make with them.

Have fun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
truss pack looks about right, thanks a lot!
